page.title: 14Industry in Wroxall 2.
page.content: Capital Printing Machinery runs Dataprint.It has been open in Wroxall for 15 months.The factory makes printing machinery.The factory uses steel,rubber,paints,cleaning materials,and polishes.The factory changes the materials by using engineering machines such as lathes, milling machines,and drills. The materials come from the Mainland and the Continent of Europe.The products are sold mainly in England,but also to Europe,and most recently to the U.S.A. There are 3 other factorys in Wroxall.There is Tecnacron circuits which makes electronic parts,and there is also another timber yard on the old railway track.There is the old bacon factory which isn't in use any more.
